structure.unit: General Provisions Relative To State Departments, Commissions, Officers And Employees

law.catch_line: Bonds Deposited With County Treasurers; Examination
law.text: Bonds of public officers, except officers in Suffolk county, required to be deposited with county treasurers shall, at least once a year, be examined by the director of accounts or his representative. If such bond is insufficient, he shall report to the superior court, which shall require a new bond, satisfactory to it, within such time as it shall order.
